packages.description:
## Package Overview

This package provides utility functions to manipulate the built-in `json` data type. It provides APIs to convert an `xml` to a `json` or convert a `table` to a `json`.

fields.name: attributePrefix
fields.description: Attribute prefix used in the XML

fields.name: preserveNamespaces
fields.description: Instructs whether to preserve the namespaces of the XML when converting

records.name: XmlOptions
records.description: Provides configurations for converting XML to JSON.

parameters.name: tableValue
parameters.description: The source table to be converted to JSON

returnParameters.description: The JSON representation of the source table

functions.name: fromTable

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The XML source to be converted to JSON

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: The `XmlOptions` record consisting of the configurations for the conversion

returnParameters.description: The JSON representation of the given XML on success, else returns an `error`

functions.name: fromXML

packages.name: jsonutils
packages.summary: This package provides utility functions to manipulate the built-in "json" data type. It provides APIs to convert an "xml" to a "json" or convert a "table" to a "json".
